fields.name: submission_text
fields.fieldText:
✅Thank you for your submission

Incident number: {!Incident_reference_number}


Thank you for recognising, recording and resolving the complaint.

This helps us continue to provide an excellent service.

fields.name: No_Further_Action
fields.fieldText:
🚫 No further action is required

If a customer hasn't been affected by an outage, then there is no requirement for us to record this.

validationRule.errorMessage: The value provided in the Incident Reference Number does not match the required format. E.g: INCD-000123-a

validationRule.errorMessage: Landline telephone number should have a maximum of 11 digits or be empty.
Mobile telephone number should have exactly 11 digits or be empty.
